___eol.description: Character(s) to use as line terminators. [JS,CSS,HTML]

___end_with_newline.description: Ensure newline at end of file. [JS,CSS,HTML]

___max_preserve_newlines.description: Number of line-breaks to be preserved in one chunk. [JS,HTML]

___wrap_line_length.description: Wrap lines at next opportunity after N characters. [JS,HTML]

___newline_between_rules.description: Add a newline between CSS rules. [CSS]

___selector_separator_newline.description: Add a newline between multiple selectors. [CSS]

___void_elements.description: HTLM void elements - aka self-closing tags. [HTML]

___content_unformatted.description: List of tags whose content should not be reformatted. [HTML]

___wrap_attributes_indent_size.description: Indent wrapped attributes to after N characters. Defaults to 'indent_size'. [HTML]

___unformatted.description: List of tags that should not be reformatted. [HTML]

___extra_liners.description: List of tags that should have an extra newline before them. [HTML]

___space_in_paren.description: Add padding spaces within parentheses, ie. f( a, b ). [JS]

___space_after_anon_function.description: Add a space before an anonymous function's parens, ie. function (). [JS]

___space_before_conditional.description: Ensure a space before conditional statement. [JS]

___e4x.description: Pass E4X xml literals through untouched. [JS]

___comma_first.description: Put commas at the beginning of new line instead of end. [JS]

___unescape_strings.description: Decode printable characters encoded in xNN notation. [JS]

___operator_position.description: Move operators to before or after a new line, or keep as is. [JS]

___break_chained_methods.description: Break chained method calls across subsequent lines. [JS]

___space_after_named_function.description: Add a space before a named function's parens, ie. function example (). [JS]

___space_in_empty_paren.description: Leave space in empty parentheses, ie. f( ). [JS]
